verses.t: But{G1161} there were{G1096} false prophets{G5578} also{G2532} among{G1722} the people{G3588}, even{G2532} as{G5613} there shall be{G2071} false teachers{G5572} among{G1722} you{G5213}, who{G3748} privily shall bring in{G3919} damnable{G684} heresies{G139}, even{G2532} denying{G720} the Lord{G1203} that bought{G59} them{G846}, and bring upon{G1863} themselves{G1438} swift{G5031} destruction{G684}.
